Subject: Lorem ipsum
TextBody: Chuck Norris is ambidextrous. He can do Roundhouse kicks with his left and right leg. ALL AT THE SAME TIME Fool me once, shame on you. Fool Chuck Norris once and he will roundhouse you in the face There is no chin behind Chuck Norris' beard. There is only another fist Chuck Norris can win a game of Connect Four in only three moves, Chuck Norris is the reason why Waldo is hiding. Remember the Soviet Union? They decided to quit after watching a DeltaForce marathon on Satellite TV.
